statements: DELETE FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE session_id = 1 AND participant_id = 101;
DELETE FROM remote_work_training_sessions_attendance WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe' AND session_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe' AND attendee_count < 10;
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Trainer' AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM training_sessions WHERE session_id = 101 AND topic = 'Agile Development';
DELETE FROM evaluations WHERE session_id = (SELECT session_id FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-10-15') AND attendee_id = 201;
